activities:
Softarex Technologies, Inc. is a software outsourcing company which provides software development services. Softarex Technologies, Inc. also manages two projects under its name, Gigzone.com and Codenforcer. Softarex Technologies, Inc.'s website is here: http://www.softarex.com/index.php/en/ 

The privacy policy for the two projects is the same as the one listed for Softarex Technologies, Inc.

Gigzone.com, a Softarex project, serves as a Universal online booking system and online Social Network, which connects both entertainers and talent agencies. The Website facilitates connections between performers looking to promote themselves internationally and consumers looking to hire live entertainment. It provides artists with a platform to publish and share videos and photos of their performances. Talent agencies and other consumers may also post their upcoming events and job opportunities. The Website allows its user to advertise on its homepage. The Website connects professional performers and their customers and enables direct online booking. 
The website for this project is here: http://gigzone.com/
The privacy policy for Gigzone.com is here: http://gigzone.com/privacy_policy/;jsessionid=3D9AE9DD580C74AF0DF70C28C500CEB4 

Codenforcer, a Softarex project, is a computer software product for use in software development and programming, mainly source code analysis and review based on programming industry standards and source code documentation and review. 
The website for this project is here: http://www.codenforcer.com/
The privacy policy for Codenforcer is here: http://codenforcer.com/privacy_policy.aspx

The activities of Softarex Technologies, Inc. and its two projects, Codenforcer and Gigzone.com include(i) collection, storing, analysis, processing, and deletion of personal data (including name, address, phone number), (ii) sending of software and data materials to recipients, and (iii) billing, account and payment processing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line and off-line customer data which may be manually processed
recoursemech: Cooperation with EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner pursuant to the Safe Harbor certification.
